unnormalised: Rental Agreements: Don't Get Caught With Your Dhoti Down!
normalised: Rental Agreements: Don't Get Caught With Your Dhoti Down!

unnormalised: Mumbai: Finding that perfect 1BHK near Dadar station is only half the battle. That rental agreement? Crucial, yaar! Landlords, like Dr. Sharma down the street, are getting stricter.
normalised: Mumbai: Finding that perfect one B H K near Dadar station is only half the battle. That rental agreement? Crucial, yaar! Landlords, like Doctor Sharma down the street, are getting stricter.

unnormalised: This diwali, ensure your rental agreement is water-tight. Many are overlooking key clauses on maintenance fees, security deposits (think Rs. 50,000 often!) and lock-in periods. Especially if you're renting a swanky new apartment near Powai with all those amenities.
normalised: This diwali, ensure your rental agreement is water-tight. Many are overlooking key clauses on maintenance fees, security deposits (think rupee fifty thousand often!) and lock-in periods. Especially if you're renting a swanky new apartment near Powai with all those amenities.

unnormalised: Experts at HDFC Realty advise reading the fine print. Common disputes involve sudden rent hikes and unexpected eviction notices. Remember, a notarized agreement is your legal protection.
normalised: Experts at H D F C Realty advise reading the fine print. Common disputes involve sudden rent hikes and unexpected eviction notices. Remember, a notarized agreement is your legal protection.

unnormalised: Ignoring your agreement can cost you! Mr. Rajesh Kumar learned that the hard way when he had to vacate his 800 sq ft flat in Bandra after a disagreement over painting costs. Don't be a Rajesh! Stay informed and happy renting!
normalised: Ignoring your agreement can cost you! Mister Rajesh Kumar learned that the hard way when he had to vacate his eight hundred square feet flat in Bandra after a disagreement over painting costs. Don't be a Rajesh! Stay informed and happy renting!
